Description: Test rule By Mohamad Al-Shahwan and Ahmad Altrabsheh for Archive Collected Data: Archive via Utility T1560.001
DisplayName: Archive Collected Data: Archive via Utility T1560.001
Name: 60d05980-3284-44e3-b6b7-18d5b6251ea1
Query:
let ExfilDomains = dynamic(["dropbox.com", "googleapis.com", "onedrive.live.com", "mega.nz", "pastebin.com", "anonfiles.com", "transfer.sh", "cdn.discordapp.com", "discord.com"]);
let ArchiveSoftwares = dynamic(["7z.exe", "7zG.exe", "7za.exe", "zip.exe", "rar.exe", "tar.exe", "compact.exe", "powerarchiver.exe", "winrar.exe"]);
let ArchiveExtensions = dynamic([".zip", ".rar", ".7z", ".tar.gz", ".cab", ".gzip", ".tar"]);
let StagingTools = dynamic(["robocopy.exe", "xcopy.exe", "copy.exe", "move.exe", "cmd.exe", "bash.exe", "wsl.exe", "git-bash.exe"]);
let ArchiveEvents = DeviceFileEvents
    | where ActionType == "FileCreated" or ActionType contains "Rename"
    | where InitiatingProcessFileName has_any (ArchiveSoftwares)
    | where FileName has_any (ArchiveExtensions)
    | extend
        ArchiveFileName = FileName,
        ArchiveFilePath = FolderPath,
        FileCreatedTime = TimeGenerated, // Keep TimeGenerated as FileCreatedTime
        FileSizeMB = round(todouble(FileSize) / 1024 / 1024, 2)
    | project
        DeviceId,
        DeviceName,
        ArchiveFileName,
        ArchiveFilePath,
        FileCreatedTime,
        FileSizeMB,
        ArchiveProcess = InitiatingProcessFileName,
        ArchiveCommand = InitiatingProcessCommandLine;
let SuspiciousConnections = DeviceNetworkEvents
    | extend RemoteUrlLower = tolower(RemoteUrl)
    | where RemoteUrlLower has_any (ExfilDomains)
    | extend ConnectionTime = TimeGenerated // Keep TimeGenerated as ConnectionTime
    | project
        DeviceId,
        DeviceName,
        RemoteUrl = RemoteUrlLower,
        ConnectionTime,
        ExfilProcess = InitiatingProcessFileName,
        ExfilCommand = InitiatingProcessCommandLine,
        Action = "Outbound to C2/Storage";
let StagingActivityProcess = DeviceProcessEvents
    | where InitiatingProcessFileName has_any (StagingTools)
    | where ProcessCommandLine has_any (
        // Windows staging commands
        "copy", "xcopy", "robocopy", "move"
        )
    | extend StagingTime = TimeGenerated // Keep TimeGenerated as StagingTime
    | project
        DeviceId,
        DeviceName,
        StagingProcess = InitiatingProcessFileName,
        StagingCommand = ProcessCommandLine,
        StagingTime;
let StagingActivityPowerShell = DeviceEvents
    | where ActionType == "PowerShellCommand"
    | where InitiatingProcessCommandLine has_any ("Copy-Item", "Move-Item", "Get-ChildItem", "Out-File", "Export-CSV", "mv", "cp")
    | extend StagingTime = TimeGenerated // Keep TimeGenerated as StagingTime
    | project
        DeviceId,
        DeviceName,
        StagingProcess = InitiatingProcessFileName, // This will capture "powershell.exe" or similar
        StagingCommand = InitiatingProcessCommandLine,
        StagingTime;
let StagingActivity = union StagingActivityProcess, StagingActivityPowerShell;
ArchiveEvents
| join kind=inner (
    SuspiciousConnections
    )
    on DeviceId
| where ConnectionTime between ((FileCreatedTime - 5m) .. (FileCreatedTime + 5m)) // Direct comparison for 10-minute window around archive creation
| join kind=inner (
    StagingActivity
    )
    on DeviceId
| where (StagingTime between ((FileCreatedTime - 30m) .. (FileCreatedTime))) // Direct comparison for 30-minute window before archive creation
| extend TimeGenerated = FileCreatedTime // Use the primary event time for Sentinel's rule engine
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    DeviceName,
    FileCreatedTime,
    ArchiveFileName,
    ArchiveFilePath,
    FileSizeMB,
    RemoteUrl,
    ConnectionTime,
    ArchiveProcess,
    ArchiveCommand,
    ExfilProcess,
    ExfilCommand,
    StagingProcess,
    StagingCommand,
    StagingTime,
    Action
